alert.note: Alert for Lee; Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CLAIBORNE...NORTHWESTERN HAWKINS...HANCOCK...GRAINGER...LEE AND WESTERN SCOTT COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cranks to Binghamtown. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gate City, Sneedville, Rutledge, Jonesville, New Tazewell, Bean Station, Tazewell, Pennington Gap, Weber City, and Harrogate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
